compliance_issues.description: Document references English law instead of ADGM law
compliance_issues.current_text: This agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England and Wales.
compliance_issues.recommended_text: This agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Abu Dhabi Global Market.

compliance_issues.description: Document references English courts instead of ADGM courts
compliance_issues.current_text: The parties hereby submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.
compliance_issues.recommended_text: The parties hereby submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the Abu Dhabi Global Market.

compliance_issues.description: Missing ADGM arbitration clause for dispute resolution
compliance_issues.recommended_text: Any disputes arising from this agreement shall be resolved through ADGM arbitration procedures in accordance with ADGM regulations.

red_flags.description: References to non-ADGM jurisdiction (England and Wales)
red_flags.impact: Contract may be unenforceable in ADGM
red_flags.suggested_action: Replace all jurisdiction references with ADGM-compliant language

red_flags.description: No mention of ADGM legal framework or regulations
red_flags.suggested_action: Add references to relevant ADGM regulations

missing_documents: Service Specifications (Schedule A referenced but not provided)
checklist_verification.user_message: Document is mostly complete but missing Service Specifications (Schedule A). Please provide detailed service specifications to ensure full compliance.

legal_references.title: Governing Law Requirements
legal_references.relevance: Directly applicable to governing law clauses

legal_references.title: Dispute Resolution Procedures
legal_references.relevance: Required for proper dispute resolution clauses

rag_enhancements.compliance_guidance: For ADGM compliance, all contracts must specify ADGM as the governing jurisdiction and include proper dispute resolution procedures. The current document violates these fundamental requirements and should be revised accordingly.

recommendations: Immediately replace all references to English law with ADGM law
Update jurisdiction clauses to reference ADGM courts
Add ADGM arbitration clause for dispute resolution
Include references to relevant ADGM regulations
next_steps: Revise governing law and jurisdiction sections
Review final document for ADGM compliance
Submit for legal review if required
